title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2453/2001 of 13 December 2001 amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain products from the milk sector exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 2453/2001
of 13 December 2001
amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain products from the milk sector exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the markets in the milk and milk products sector(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1670/2000(2), and in particular Article 31(3) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The rates of the refunds applicable from 1 December 2001 to the products listed in the Annex, exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty, were fixed by Commission Regulation (EC) No 2346/2001(3).
(2) It follows from applying the rules and criteria contained in Regulation (EC) No 2346/2001 to the information at present available to the Commission that the export refunds at present applicable should be altered as shown in the Annex hereto,
main_body: The rates of refund fixed by Regulation (EC) No 2346/2001 are hereby altered as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 14 December 2001.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 2001.
For the Commission
Erkki Liikanen
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48.
(2) OJ L 193, 29.7.2000, p. 10.
(3) OJ L 315, 1.12.2001, p. 36.
ANNEX
to the Commission Regulation of 13 December 2001 altering the rates of the refunds applicable to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
